data.field.description: Name of the field in the record that contains the data to be written to the specified stream. The data could be in binary format as a byte array or a ByteBuffer. It can also be a String. If unspecified, the 'data' key is used.

headers.field.description: Name of the field in the record that contains headers. Headers are presumed to be a map of string to string.

name.description: The name of the stream to output to. Must be a valid stream name. The stream will be created if it does not exist.
